actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit discrimination on the basis of age, against individuals who are seventy years of age or older.

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to remove the existing 70-year upper age limit of the class to which the discrimination prohibitions apply, thus extending coverage to all individuals who are at least 40 years of age.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit discrimination on the basis of age, against individuals who are seventy years of age or older.
